name: The Sims 2: Seasons
description:
Walk barefoot in your very own vegetable garden as your seeds flourish and sprout. Sims with green thumbs can join the Gardening Club to help build aspiration points and gain popularity with the neighbors. Harvest the fruits of your labor to make healthy energy drinks for the whole family, or craft mysterious potions to spice up your love life.

With six new career paths for your Sim to enjoy, there’s no need to stay trapped in an unsatisfying job in Sim world again. Sims can now become teachers, lawyers, and professional musicians. The possibilities for enhancing the lives of your Sims have never been greater.

With new things to buy and more exciting activities to engage in, the world of The Sims continues to thrill the fantasy seeker more with every expansion. You can even bundle up and start a snowball fight with that neighbor who keeps snooping around in your yard.
